subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Petty Enterprises has sold a majority interest to the private equity firm Boston Ventures. Richard Petty, the seven-time champion and team owner, will remain as chairman emeritus.
snippet: Petty Enterprises has sold a majority interest to the private equity firm Boston Ventures. Richard Petty, the seven-time champion and team owner, will remain as chairman emeritus.
